# INMessageAttributeOptionsResolutionResult

**Class**

A resolution result for a search parameter that filters by message status.

## Declaration

```swift
class INMessageAttributeOptionsResolutionResult
```

## Overview

You create [doc://com.apple.sirikit/documentation/Intents/INMessageAttributeOptionsResolutionResult] objects when resolving intent parameters containing a value of type [doc://com.apple.sirikit/documentation/Intents/INMessageAttributeOptions]. Use the creation method that best reflects your ability to resolve the parameter. For additional resolution options, see [doc://com.apple.sirikit/documentation/Intents/INIntentResolutionResult].

## Creating a Resolution Result Object

- **success(with:)**: Creates an object whose resolution involves the successful matching of the specified attribute.
- **confirmationRequired(with:)**: Creates an object whose resolution requires that the user must confirm the value before proceeding.

## Providing Resolution Results

- **INMessageAttributeResolutionResult**: A resolution result for assorted attributes of a message.
- **INDateComponentsRangeResolutionResult**: A resolution result for a range of dates in a parameter of an intent.
- **INSendMessageRecipientResolutionResult**: A resolution result for the recipient of a message.
- **INPersonResolutionResult**: A resolution result for a user as a parameter of an intent.
- **INOutgoingMessageTypeResolutionResult**: A resolution result for the message’s format.

## Inherits From

- INIntentResolutionResult

## Conforms To

- CVarArg
- CustomDebugStringConvertible
- CustomStringConvertible
- Equatable
- Hashable
- NSObjectProtocol
